extendedInfo.description: Single Ladies Dating Advice App gives you first hand dating tips you never get anywhere else. It gives weekly updates on different topics single men and women struggle with. Brilliant suggestions are broadcast on the advice portals from a well experience relationship expert. The Application is linked with other social networks such as twitter and Facebook, whereby feeds from  other relationship and motivational experts can be linked to one page on the App. You can even send one to one massages to our relationship expert in situations whereby you need more clarity on dating issues.Please be advised that all views expressed by the author of this Application are of personal opinion, and that the writings are not meant to defame, purge, humiliate or injure anyone should they decide to act upon or reuse any information provided by this application.All photographs, icons and graphic images used were obtained from other websites and blogs. And do not portray any particular artist, actress or model as being a "single lady" but solely used as a graphic symbol on the Application, and in no way is it to cause offense or harm to anyone.

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Wasn\'t expecting much, but the advice column happens to be on point. It\'s no fancy tech App but gives straight relationship advice. It worked perfectly with my Xperia phn, doesn\'t open with older HTC android mobiles! Developer should try updating advice column more often, but generally good App. Highly recommended.
reviews.author: Benjamin Omojola

reviews.title: Waste
reviews.comment: The advice column didn\'t open. Waste of time.
reviews.author: A Google User
